title: How to crack the GATE with a good rank - Quora
tags: Indian Institutes of Technology Student Experience

response.answer_text: Top Rank in GATE or in any other exam is mainly a result of a sense of confidence that the person develops over time with thorough coverage of most of the subjects and enough practice. Not only these two things are enough. Habits of keeping yourself calm and relax, not comparing yourself with others, believing in yourself will bring you among the toppers of the exam. Below are the tips which should be followed: Do enough practice on each subject. If you do not understand a thing, understand it and do not skip it. Do not leave topics misunderstood or not-understood. Understand them clearly.Topic tests, Subject tests, Mock tests should be attempted honestly and seriously. Solve test questions on a notepad. Use pencil. Develop the practice of reading questions carefully. This is to avoid the habit of doing silly mistakes. Gently perform calculations. Develop the practice of checking your process of solving the question in a quicker manner.Develop the practice of attempting most of the questions. It means make yourself faster in attempting questions. This comes through enough practice and good understanding of subjects.Start reading books. There is nothing better than a book reading exercise. Follow standard books. Ponder about what you have read.Practice the exercises that are present behind the chapters of these books. This step is optional but it takes you to the core of the subjects.Keep thinking about these subjects and the topics. Ask different different questions about them. In this way, you will make your brain sharper and will open the doors and windows of your mind. You will be thinking better and logical.Have a good set of people around you during your preparation time. Have valuable discussions with them on your subjects.Do not develop worries. Understand that worrying is not going to produce any value. Do not compare yourself with others. Compare yourself with yourself only every day. Track your progress on where and how are you going.Become your own guide. Guide yourself in learning new things at their bests. Keep reading. Keep experimenting. Keep implementing. In this manner, you will develop the required scientific curiosity, temper, thought process and true engineering skills.PS: I am a computer science student and so I can guide you on that completely. GATE is a simple examination. Keep your basics clear. Follow the above steps. You will get much more than just a top GATE rank. All the best :) :)

Hello aspirants First of all i would like to wish everyone best of luck for their upcoming exams.Getting a top rank in exam needs much hardwork and dedication, Now for clearing any exam with good result requires hard work. Just keep in mind one thing “Hard work is the real key to success”. And for exams like GATE you need to work more harder and keep believe in yourself that yes you can do it then surely success will be under your feet. So just start your preparation and right now forget about the results. Just keep in mind one more thing that “One important key to success is self-confidence. An important key to self-confidence is preparation." Now here i can share my startegy which i followed during my preparation which i think you should also follow and it may bring wonders in life for you as it does for me. First of all i will recommend you to make a strategy that how will you approach towards your target and make your plans according to that and follow the below mentioned steps :- Step 1:-Take the first step by understanding what you are up against, information you need before you plan and then begin the actual preparation. Step 2:-Collect information about the syllabus of your branch for GATE. Step 3:-Know the importance of each subject and start preparing according to that Step 4:-Also focus on Engineering mathematics and Aptitude as they are easy to score. Step 5:-Buy a full study material of reputed coaching like made easy it will surely strengthen your concepts or you can also go for made easy handwritten classroom notes. Step 6:-Start taking mocks (proctered as well as unproctered) as many as you can and always analyse each of your mock as it will help you the most in boosting up your score. Now the question arises the availability of the study material, Handwritten notes and test series as these are not available easily everywhere and if there are then the cost will be too high or the quality will not be up to the mark so come on let me give you solution for this also which i experienced personally. There is a online website named as NOTES4U(.IN) which provide all the study stuff at very reasonable and friendly prices and the highlighting feature of there is the service, quality of material, originality and the timely delivery. I am saying all this so because i have personally experienced and i was very happy with them. So i must suggest you to go for NOTES4U. ALL THE BEST…
